conversations.conversation:
I would like to update you ;G603;quarry situation at present . Because overexploitation of G603 old quarry and government factors , the quarry will be close by the end of June , 2012 .
;
;Here we are glad to tell you that we have new cooperated quarry of G603, the material is perfect for flamed and bush hammered finish, especially suitable for outdoor using such as paving, kerb stone, sizes like 10x10cm , 30x30cm, 30x60cm etc. We can supply it at most competitive prices and finish your orders in the shortest time. No matter how big is your order, supplying is absolutely no problem for us!;

Granite ;G648; is also name Golden pink .
;Main color: Brown, Pink
;We are quarry owner of G648 and have our factory in quarry specialize for G648 products.
;It is a granite in pink color mixed with brown and white. Its’ pretty pink color is very suitable for construction project , little color difference , good quality and never loss color in sunshine and acid rain.
;G648 tiles and slabs can be used for floor, wall, kitchen countertops , hollow columns etc.
;; ;

New ;G635; granite is pink granite from China . Because old G635 quarry has been closed , New G635 are more and more used ,instead of old G635 granite.
;Main Pink
;We are quarry owner of new G635 and have our factory in quarry specialize for new G635 products.
;
;Its’ pretty pink color is very suitable for construction project , little color difference , good quality and never loss color in sunshine and acid rain.
;;G648 tiles; can be used for floor, wall, kitchen countertops , hollow columns etc.
;;;;

We are the granite supplier , we have our own granite quarry G603. the granite G603 is very suitable used in outdoor like the plaza, sidewalk, landscape . it’s widely made by flooring tiles, kerb stone ect with the surface finish of lychee, or flamed.
;We can supply you large quantity of this granite products or block, if you what to know more, welcome to inquiry!
;;www.603s.info; click here to know more about the granite .

We would like to tell you we have built a new factory in the area very close to quarry of G648 granite , specialize in various G648 products to meet project request . G648 is suitable for many kinds of products for construction and decoration projects , such as tiles , countertops, kerb and pavings , stairs , tombstone etc.
;The most advantage is , because the factory is very near to quarry , it save a lot of time and cost for raw material shipping , it will be good for us to supply the best prices and finish products in the shortest . Moreover, it will be easier for our professional workers to check raw material quality .
;
;Please find price idea as following,
;Material : G648 Granite
;Price: FOB Xiamen, China
;(1) Tiles 300x600x15mm polished surface , cut to size : USD 9.50 per square meter.
;(2) Random slabs 2400 mm up x 730 mm x 2cm ,polished : USD 13.50 per square meter.
;(3) Countertops 96 x 26 x 3/4 inch , surface and one long side polished , cut to size: USD 35.00 per piece
;(4) Kerb 1000 x 300 x 150 mm ,flamed surface , cut to size : USD 14.00 per linear meter.
;(5) Stairs 1200 x 350 x 30 mm, surface and one long side polished : USD 9.00 per piece .

We are G681 granite supplier, we have cooperated granite quarry, our own plant ,we can supply you the granite continuously with competitive price. welcome to visit here ;www.stone21.com; to choose more granite you want. we can supply you the tiles, countertop, kerbstone ect. we can make it according to you requirement.;

;G635; is mainly used for flooring, cladding, kitchen counters and table tops. It looks best when it is glossy however honed, flamed and river-washed finishes are also available. Available in both slabs and tiles. This stone is used worldwide in a number of large projects.
;
;New G635 granite is pink granite from China . Because old G635 quarry has been closed , New G635 are more and more used ,instead of old G635 granite.
;Main Pink
;We are quarry owner of new G635 and have our factory in quarry specialize for new G635 products.
;
;Its’ pretty pink color is very suitable for construction project , little color difference , good quality and never loss color in sunshine and acid rain.
;G648 tiles can be used for floor, wall, kitchen countertops , hollow columns etc.

G635, is also call Sesame Pink , it is a bright Red Granite from China. Good price and beautiful color, suitable for floor tiles, steps, balustrades, countertops, slabs, kitchen tops, monuments and carving.
;General Usage for G635 Granite
;G635 is mainly used for flooring, cladding, kitchen counters and table tops. It looks best when it is glossy however honed, flamed and river-washed finishes are also available. Available in both slabs and tiles. This stone is used worldwide in a number of large projects.
;We have our own granite quarry G635, we can supply you large quantity of this granite product, like tiles, slab, countertop, kerb stone, block ect. Our G635 is New G635 granite, it is pink granite from China . Because old G635 quarry has been closed , New G635 are more and more used ,instead of old G635 granite. Its’ pretty pink color is very suitable for construction project , little color difference , good quality and never loss color in sunshine and acid rain.
;We can offer the granite with various kind of specification, also we can make it according to your drawings. Welcome to inquiry if you want to know more.
